outputs.output_descr:
Identify and confirm priority actions in the thematic areas of biodiversity, climate change and desertification.
Asses capacity development needs common to the thematic areas  and stregnthen coordination and follow-up of national environemtal managemen activities with global significance, including request for external assitance and the awareness-raising of relevant target groups.

project_title: NATIONAL CAPACITY SELF ASSESSMENT GLOBAL ENV. MANAGEMENT
